mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods g, category c WHERE g.c_no = c.c_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(g_no, c_no, name, detail, stock, purchase_price, sell_price, discount_rate, saving_mileage, show) VALUES(g_no.nextval, #{c_no}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{stock}, #{purchase_price}, #{sell_price}, #{discount_rate}, #{saving_mileage}, #{show})
